---
id: pix-dict-update-v-2
title: "Update DICT Entry account information"
description: "Updates a dict entry."
sidebar_label: "Update DICT Entry account information"

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update DICT Entry account information"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/v2/pix/dict/entry/{key}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates a dict entry.

To be used in the scenario of updating a customer's account information, name and business name, remaining on the same PSP.
Only the customer's account information, name and business name can be updated. Other bond updates
must be made by exclusion/inclusion of the dict entry, portability or claim of possession, depending on the situation.

### Restrictions
The following restrictions must be observed when updating the dict entry, according to the type of key:
   - `EVP` (random) keys - Changes are allowed, however, only with the reasons `BRANCH_TRANSFER` or `RECONCILIATION`.
   - Other keys - Changes are allowed with the reasons `USER_REQUESTED`, `BRANCH_TRANSFER` or `RECONCILIATION`.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"examples":{"E-mail":{"value":"email@gmail.com"},"CPF":{"value":"12345678900"},"Phone":{"value":5510998765432},"CNPJ":{"value":"66486782000129"}},"name":"key","description":"The DICT key.","schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}

Must respect the pattern '[0-9]{1,4}'.","type":"string"},"key":{"description":"Addressing key. Must be a CPF, CNPJ, E-mail, phone or EVP.\n\nCPF: ^[0-9]{11}$\n\nCNPJ: ^[0-9]{14}$\n\nE-mail: Valid W3C HTML5 e-mail address\n\nPhone: ^+[1-9][0-9]\\d{1,14}$\n\nEVP: [0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}","type":"string"},"openingDate":{"format":"date-time","description":"The account opening date.
